itinerary.title: Goa: Optimized Chill Beach Hopper's Budget Backpacking Itinerary
itinerary.overview: A relaxed 4-day exploration of Goa's beaches and local culture, focusing on authentic experiences, delicious street food, and minimizing costs by optimizing locations to reduce travel time. This itinerary avoids crowded tourist traps in favour of hidden gems and a slow pace.

days.title: South Goa: Palolem & Agonda Relaxation
days.narrative: Arrive in South Goa and head straight to Palolem. Settle in, grab some breakfast, and spend the day exploring Palolem and nearby Agonda Beach. Consolidating to nearby beaches reduces travel time on day one.

activities.name: Breakfast at Palolem Beach Shack
activities.description: Find a shack serving local Goan breakfast - Pao Bhaji, or Samosa. Enjoy the sea view.

activities.name: Relax & Swim at Palolem Beach
activities.description: Soak up the sun, swim in the calm waters, and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere.

activities.name: Lunch at Palolem
activities.description: Find cheap local thali places at Palolem

activities.name: Agonda Beach Visit
activities.description: Agonda Beach exploration. Quiet and serene, perfect for sunset.

activities.name: Sunset Drinks
activities.description: Kingfisher beer at a beach shack while enjoying the sunset.

activities.name: Chill Evening
activities.description: Relax at the beach or your accommodation.

days.title: South Goa: Exploring Cavelossim & Nearby Beaches
days.narrative: Focus on the beaches closer to Cavelossim to avoid long commutes. This allows for a more relaxed exploration of the Southern coastline.

activities.name: Cavelossim/Mabor Beach - Watersports
activities.description: Clean sands, parasailing and jet skiing options available.

activities.name: Varca Beach
activities.description: Just north of Cavelossim, walk or short ride.

days.title: Dudhsagar Falls & Spice Plantation
days.narrative: A day trip to Dudhsagar Falls, one of India's tallest waterfalls and a visit to a local spice plantation.

activities.name: Dudhsagar Falls Trip
activities.description: Early start for the trip to Dudhsagar Falls. Jeep safari to the falls base (arrange tour in advance).

activities.name: Lunch at Spice Plantation
activities.description: Traditional Goan lunch at a Spice Plantation.

activities.name: Spice Plantation Tour
activities.description: Guided tour of the spice plantation, learning about local spices.

activities.name: Live music at For the Record

days.title: Arambol Beach - Final Relaxation & Departure
days.narrative: Focus solely on Arambol on the last day to ensure a relaxed departure.
